inn1.comm: gone first ball, that's plumb from Mitchell Starc! Bell is trapped lbw right in front of the stumps, what a start from Starc. He swung the ball in from length, the seam facing leg slip, Bell wanted to defend without moving much and the ball came in to catch him right in front of the stumps. Boom!
outside the off stump this time, Taylor goes across a bit and defends on the leg side

oh, one more, Starc's struck twice in three balls! Another one swinging in towards the stumps, this was fuller compared to the one Bell got, Taylor went back in the crease to clip the ball on the leg side but was beaten by the movement and struck in front of leg stump. Wasn't as plumb as Bell, but looked out
bang on target again from Starc - middle-stump line for the length delivery and Root defends solidly
too full way outside off and Root cashes in by just pushing it over backward point for four. He didn't drive it with a lot of power, but it timed it very well
outside off on length with the angle, Root defends on the off side
starts with a short and wide delivery down the leg side
back of length just outside leg, clipped off the hips to the leg side and he's off the mark
short and wide outside off, left alone
bit short and wide, Root steers it straight to point where Smith dives to his left to save a few runs
fuller and still well outside off, Root drives and misses it without moving much towards the ball
bit closer to the off stump on length, he lets it go this time
good-length delivery outside off, Root defends it back
angles it in towards the pads, clipped behind square on the leg side for one
wide outside off on length and angling away, Root chases that with a drive and misses
drivable length outside off again, and he drives it down to mid off

run out chance - but not a direct hit! Root clipped the ball on the leg side, Bailey got to it quickly, switched the ball from left hand to right and had a shy at non-striker's as Root dived to get it, but the ball missed the stumps
outside the off stump on length and he defends it back
strays towards the pads and Moeen flicks it beautifully off the pads and over the infield for four. Excellent wrist work
length delivery just outside off, he defends on the leg side
back of length outside off, Root hops on his toes and defends
length delivery outside off again, left alone this time

Cummins as well, he gets Joe Root, England 12 for 3. Cummins had been pitching those on drivable length outside off and it pays off. Root drove this length delivery and edged it straight to Watson at first slip for an easy catch, around waist height
just short of length around off with the angle, Morgan leaves it on length
touch fuller on the off stump, Morgan puts his right foot forward and blocks
fullish on the off stump, Moeen flicks it again nicely with his wrists between midwicket and mid on in the gap for two

another risky single! Moeen defended the length delivery on the off side and took off, Warner came in from mid off and had a shy at non-striker's end where Moeen had to dive to make his ground. No direct hit, though
back of length and just outside off, Morgan defends on the leg side off the back foot
stays back again and defends the length ball solidly
bangs it in short of length outside off, Morgan lets it go
even shorter outside the off stump, good bounce and it's left again
beaten! Quick and shortish outside off with the angle, Moeen didn't have any time to move his feet, chased it outside off and missed
fuller on the stumps, pushed down to mid off this time
in the air as Moeen flashes at it outside off, flies away to third man for one
good-length delivery right on off stump, Morgan defends it carefully on the off side
reaches out for this one outside off and drives it into the covers
slightly short of length outside off, steers it towards point
147kph, length delivery outside the off stump, pushed down the ground
that's gone all the way! It was on Moeen's pads, his strong area, and he clipped it away powerfully off the pads with his wrists to the wide long on boundary for six
149kph, inswinging yorker towards off stump, Moeen digs it out on off
back of length and coming into the batsman, worked on the leg side
attempted yorker is a high full toss outside off, steered straight to point

in the air again - just wide of second slip as this one pitched on short of length outside off, had the extra bounce and Moeen poked at it for a thick outside edge. Cummins ran a long way from third man to keep it to two
length delivery outside off, steers it past point for one to third man
seaming away from middle stump after pitching on length, Moeen stays back and defends it
short ball this time down the leg side, called a wide
short of length on the leg side again, worked to deep midwicket for one
short of length on middle and leg, clipped off the back foot to deep midwicket for one
driven on the up and that clears the infield for another four! It wasn't full but Moeen had enough room to free his arms and drove it beautifully over covers for four
length delivery outside off and Moeen defends it back

extra bounce troubled Morgan! It was a short ball for which Morgan didn't go back, and the bounce got his glove nearly in front of his face as he took his eyes off the ball. The ball went in the air but in the gap on the leg side

Moeen's gone, that's another big wicket! It was the back of length delivery from Faulkner, Glenn Maxwell had been placed in the deep on the off side as Moeen drove again on the up, didn't middle it and Maxi took an easy catch
in the air again as Morgan drives it on the up but in the gap in the covers for one
on the stumps on good length, Bopara defends it back
shorter this time around middle stump, Bopara stays back and clips it to leg gully. No time for a run
length delivery on middle and leg, clipped on the leg side
outside the off stump this time, Morgan stays back and defends to midwicket
shorter on the pads, worked away behind square on the leg side
bit too full outside off and Bopara crunches it through the covers for four with a cracking drive
length delivery outside off, he stays back and defends it back to the bowler
on length again, bit wider outside off, Bopara lets it go
rolls in the slightly slower ball towards the stumps, Morgan looks to work it on leg but doesn't time it well
fuller and angled in towards middle and leg, pushes it down to mid on
comes down the track and clips the ball off the pads to fine leg for one
back of length and angling away from outside off, Bopara defends it with soft hands on the leg side for a quick one
full and straight on off, driven down to mid off off the front foot
on length but it's too wide and Morgan reaches out to drive it square of the wicket in the gap for four
short ball down the leg side for a wide
angled in towards the stumps, Bopara helps it down to fine leg for one
fullish outside off, guides it to point with an open face of the bat
right on target on the off stump, Morgan stays back and defends on the off side
short ball this time and Morgan plays the ramp shot well over the slip fielders and wide of third man for a one-bounce four. Waited for it and timed it very well to place it in the gap
length delivery on the off stump, he defends it back
length delivery angled across outside off, Morgan pushes it to cover point
on middle and leg and it's clipped towards square leg for one
length delivery around off with a hint of turn, steered off the back foot to sweeper cover
fullish on off and middle, Bopara paddles it fine on the leg side for two
flighted outside the leg stump, driven with the turn to deep midwicket for one
goes back in the crease and helps the ball to the leg side for one
that's beaten the batsman and the keeper for byes. It was full outside off, beat the outside edge and went past the keeper for two
fullish on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket for one
short of length and well outside off, guides it late to third man for one
short of length again but no room this time - it was on off and Morgan defended it back
touch wider outside off, steered to point this time
on the pads this time, but clipped straight to midwicket
oh, that must have slipped out of his hand! It was a beamer well over Morgan's head, but wide too outside off and it went straight to Watson at slip, who dropped it! Given a no ball, not wide
bouncer on the leg side, Morgan leaves this one too, thinking it's a wide, but not given
flighted around off, driven to cover
touch shorter on the stumps, he goes back and works it to midwicket
goes back and makes room this time to push it to cover
makes room again and cuts it to the left of cover for one
flighted on middle and leg, defended on the leg side off the front foot
bit of room on offer outside off, Morgan rocks back to make room and cuts it fiercely to the third man area for four. That's drinks
fullish outside off, pushed into the covers for a quick one
length delivery outside off, pushed off the back foot into the covers for one
another bowler has struck in his first over, Bopara gone this time! It was short outside off, Bopara went back and cut it straight to Maxwell at backward point for a straightforward catch
driven back to the bowler from the crease, off the middle
stays back and dabs the flat and straight ball on the leg side
speared into the pads and Buttler gets going with a neat tuck through square leg
good length on a tight line from over the wicket, Morgan stays in his crease and defends
that's not that short with just a bit of width outside off, Morgan gets down low and slashes, cutting the ball down to third man
good length on off stump, Buttler gets behind the line and blocks from his crease
that kept a low outside off, Buttler was beaten between bat and body and that was so close to off stump. The ball almost passed below the bottom of the bat as Buttler drove at it
defended back to the bowler

sensational stuff on the boundary from Warner. Buttler had pulled the short ball powerfully towards deep midwicket and Warner sprinted a long way to his left before putting in the full length dive to save the boundary. He's made a mess of the boundary rope though, but it looks clean
defended on the off side
driven to long off for a single
Morgan takes a stride out and blocks
Morgan unfurls the reverse sweep but doesn't make proper contact
moves a long way across his stumps and flicks the ball from middle and leg behind square
good length on of and middle, Buttler opens up his stance but ends up defending because he is cramped for room
width outside off again for Morgan and he opens the face of the bat to run the ball to third man
good length on middle and off, Buttler stays back, gets behind the line and defends on the off side
short of a length and a bit wider outside off stump, Buttler chooses to let it pass
Buttler pushes towards mid off and runs, he has to dive to make his ground, but the throw from Doherty misses the stumps
Morgan comes on the front foot and lofts the length ball through the line, hitting it straight of the fielder at mid-off and finding the boundary
tries to cut but gets a bottom edge that goes to the keeper on the bounce
defended on the front foot on the off side
tight line and length, on off and middle from round the wicket into the right-hander, Buttler blocks
defended on the front foot again
played with an open face towards point
leans forward this time to play the ball on the off side but gets a bit of an edge that runs towards third man
defended on the front foot on the leg side
outside the off stump on length, left alone for the keeper
closer to off stump on length, pushed into the covers this time
short and wide outside off as it swings away, left alone easily
fullish this time outside off, pushed through the covers in the gap for three runs
angled across the batsman outside off, left for the keeper
on off on good length with the angle, helped to third man for one to end the over
fullish on the off stump, pushed down the ground to long off
moves across towards off and clips the ball from middle and leg to midwicket
moves across towards off again and paddles it fine down the leg side for two
moves back and across in the crease to defend the ball back to the bowler
comes down the track and pushes the ball to Doherty
waits for this one on middle and leg and helps it to midwicket
right on target on the off stump on length, Buttler defends solidly
back of length on the middle stump, Buttler goes back and defends it

in the air dangerously and it's safe as it goes past point! Again drivable length well outside off, Buttler chased at it without much footwork and drove uppishly. Luckily for him it was far from point
fullish to Morgan now, he pushes it down the ground to mid on
swinging in this time from outside off, it was a length delivery, and Morgan got an inside edge onto his pad after it nipped it
bangs in the bouncer towards the batsman who ducks under it
bit slow and coming in towards the stumps, Buttler blocks it back
strays down the leg side now for a wide

bit too wide outside off and Buttler cuts it fiercely through the off side off the back foot. It would have gone for four but Warner chased it like there was a shark after him and saved one with a slide
takes a step forward and pushes the ball back to Doherty
length delivery around off, pushed back to the bowler
full on the pads now, pushed to midwicket this time
shorter on middle and leg, Morgan goes back and punches it down to long on for one
towards the pads and clipped to square leg for one
fullish this time now, driven down between mid on and mid off for one
well outside off, he waits for it to guide it to third man for one
angles across the slower ball outside off as Buttler pokes and misses
waits for this one and defends the ball towards point
fullish around off, pushed into the covers
goes back in the crease and works the ball to leg from middle and leg for one
flighted outside off and he reverse sweeps it straight to short third man
length delivery outside off, defends it back to the bowler
on the pads now and it's swept to fine leg for one
flighted on middle stump, helped with the turn to midwicket
slightly shorter on middle, worked to fine leg off the back foot for one
just wide of backward point! It was shortish outside off, he cut it off the back foot and it was just wide of point to go to third man for two
around length to Morgan, pushed down to mid off for one
angled across on the off stump, he defends it on the off side
back of length on middle, defends it back this time
angled across again around off, defended on the off side
length delivery on off again, defends it with soft hands for one but comes back in time to avoid a run out
goes back and works the length delivery to midwicket
tight line and length again, defends the ball back to Doherty from off
outside off this time, pushed off the back foot into the covers
straightish on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler again
on length on the off stump, Morgan defends it back to Doherty again
strays down the leg side for a wide
on the middle stump on length, defended back to end the over
length delivery on the stumps, Buttler defends it back
touch shorter on the stumps, defends it off the back foot
bit wide outside off with the angle, steered towards point
goes across and works the ball straight to midwicket
back of length on the stumps, pushed down to mid off
touch wide outside off, steered off the back foot to backward point
flighted on the leg stump, clipped to midwicket
on leg again and he paddles it fine and in the air for one behind square on leg
outside off and Buttler reverse sweeps it in the gap between point and short third man but Faulkner runs a long way to slide and saves one
fullish on the stumps, pushed down to mid on
flighted on middle stump, driven down to long on for one
length delivery on off, swept against the turn to fine leg for one
fullish on leg stump, pushed down past the bowler for a quick single
fullish on Morgan's pads now, clipped behind square leg off the legs in the gap
length delivery outside off, worked to point off the back foot
slightly slower on the off stump, pushed down the ground
his back of the hand delivery, pitched outside off and got some extra bounce to surprise Morgan as he took his eyes off the ball
on length on off now, he defends it back
goes back and across to work the ball on leg
stays back and sweeps the ball from leg to fine leg and that's the 50 partnership
on length on middle and leg, blocked back to the bowler
goes shorter on the off stump and he paddles it behind square on leg for one
fullish on the stumps and he drives it down to long for one
comes down the track and drives it to long off for one
dropped by Haddin! It was a wide delivery outside off, Buttler cut it late and the ball went towards the gloves after a thick edge but it was a tough chance because it hit the outside of the gloves
flight on off stump, driven down to long on for one
flighted on off, worked down to long off for one
that one kept low after pitching outside off as Buttler went back to cut but missed
driven down to long on where a fumble from Starc gives them two runs
fullish on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
goes back in the crease to work the ball to midwicket
charges down the track to take it on the full and lofts it down the ground over long off for six to bring up his fifty
fullish on middle and leg, worked down to mid on for a quick one
stifled appeal from Doherty for lbw as he paddled it to the leg side
length delivery is worked to mid on for one
flighted outside off, he blocks it back and that's drinks
from back of the hand on off stump, he defends it back
angled in towards the batsman, worked off the back foot to the leg side for one
full outside off, driven straight to cover

one more for Faulkner, he gets Buttler this time! Angled it across outside the off stump, Buttler drove it up and high in the air and Warner at sweeper cover took a couple of steps to take a simple catch
slightly slower towards the stumps, Morgan helps it behind square on leg for one
towards middle and leg, Woakes flicks it on leg, just wide of short midwicket
short and wide, Morgan gets room and he slaps it between point and cover point for a cracking four!
short on the leg side now, worked off the hips to fine leg for two
towards the pads again, worked on the leg side pat midwicket for two more
slower bouncer towards the batsman who goes on his toes to defend it
the extra pace on the short ball surprises him and there's no room as Morgan didn't move much and took it on his shoulder
length delivery on middle and off, pushed into the covers
length delivery on middle and leg, clipped over midwicket in the gap for two
angled across outside off, steered straight to point
wider outside off and he guides it to third man for one
strays towards the leg side and Morgan flicks it away off the pads past short fine leg for four in the gap
full and wide, punched straight into the covers
length delivery towards off stump, Morgan leans forward and blocks
dropped at fine leg! Woakes merely lofted the ball in the air off his hips, straight to Doherty but he put down a simple catch
drifts down the leg side, stifled appeal as the ball takes some pad before reaching the keeper
further down leg and Morgan gets a chance to glance it fine down the leg side for four more! Some loose deliveries coming from Cummins
good comeback - length delivery outside off is left alone
on middle and leg, worked off the pads to the leg side for one
he wanted to work it on leg but was beaten by pace and the ball ended up on the pitch after an edge
darts it in from middle stump, Morgan defends on the off side
on the stumps again, he makes room to find the gap this time on off for one
full outside off, Woakes drives powerfully and the cover fielder gets a hand to it to keep it to one
outside off, cut off the back foot for one on the off side
bit too wide outside off, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover for one
length delivery outside off, pushed into the covers
beaten outside off, Haddin thought he edged it, but umpire says no! It was a short ball outside off, Woakes went on his toes to poke and didn't get a whiff
towards the pads now and clipped in the air for one to square leg
slightly slower and on back of length, he defends off the back foot
full with some room, driven powerfully, but straight to point
short ball and it's pulled powerfully, but straight to deep midwicket for one
slower bouncer goes over Morgan and it's called a wide
short ball just down leg, defended towards midwicket for a quick single
comes down and nearly yorks himself, but pushes it down towards mid on for one
Woakes has given it away! Pretty innocuous delivery on middle and leg, Woakes went back and worked it to leg but in the air and straight to midwicket for an easy-peasy catch
wide outside off and pretty full, reaches out and drives it to point
presses forward and pushes the length delivery to point, this time for a quick single even though Jordan took off late
length delivery on off stump, defended off the back foot
towards middle and leg now, worked off the back foot to leg for one
swings it in from outside off, Morgan blocks it back
on length and wider outside off, pushed down to mid on this time
bouncer goes over Morgan's head and it's left alone for a wide
swinging into the pads, attempted yorker is a low full toss, and clipped to deep square leg for one
length delivery on the off stump, defended off the back foot on off for a quick single
bangs in the short one outside off, Morgan works it down with soft hands for one on off
fullish on the off stump, Jordan defends on the leg side
slightly short and wide, chopped off the back foot to deep point for one
outside off with the angle, cut late off the back foot for one to short third man
that's gone a long way, and all the way! He came down the track and smacked it over the long on boundary for a massive six!
outside off this time and he drives it inside out with a lot of power over the covers in the gap for four
towards the leg side now, he tries to slap it on leg but gets an edge behind square for one
outside the off stump, chopped off the back foot wide of third man for two
slightly full outside off, pushed down the ground to mid off
attempted yorker on the pads, flicked to deep square leg for one
extra bounce surprises Jordan as he is squared up by the short of length delivery and it fell just short of point
ducks under the bouncer this time on middle and leg
bit too full outside off, driven to sweeper cover for two
length delivery angled across outside off is left alone
goes back a bit and works the short of length ball to the leg side for one
length delivery on the stumps, it's defended on the leg side
slightly outside off and it's steered towards point for one
that's it, what a shot, what a hundred! He made room for the fullish delivery and smacked it over the covers for his seventh ODI hundred!
touch shorter outside off, he waits and cuts it late to send it for four fine on the off side
outside off, steered square on the off side for one and he keeps strike
short ball on the leg side, pulled to deep fine leg for one
slower bouncer on middle and leg, Jordan ducks under it
angled into the batsman, deflects off Jordan's inside edge and body for a quick single
length delivery down the leg side for a wide
short of length towards the legs, worked off the hips fine down leg for two more
makes room and guides the short of length delivery to third man for one
incoming delivery takes a thick outside edge and goes past the keeper on the off side for four. No slips there, obviously
short and wide, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover for one
short of length outside off, pushed to point, not time for a run
from back of the hand and right on the stumps, Jordan blocks it back
short ball now and it's pulled to deep midwicket for two
slower ball from the back of the hand, it's full and clipped on the leg side for two more and that's the 50 stand
accurate yorker on the stumps, Jordan defends it back
another slow one from the back of the hand, but down the leg side as Jordan looks to slap it on the leg side and it's gone for four byes after hitting Haddin's arm
another one caught in the deep and Jordan has given it away. Short on middle and leg and Jordan pulled it straight to Maxwell at deep midwicket
that's big, that's another six, his third of the innings! Made room for the incoming delivery, it was full too, he was well in the crease and lofted it high over the long on boundary for six
full outside off now and he drives it firmly in the air just wide of mid off for another boundary! Timing the ball very well, he's middling everything
length delivery outside off, steered towards point this time

another easy catch for Maxwell, this time Morgan's gone but after such a counter-attacking innings. He middled this short ball on middle stump with the pull but found Maxi at deep midwicket. What a fighting innings from the captain
started the innings with a wicket, and ends with one too! He came round the wicket and darted a yorker right on the off stump, Finn missed it and was bowled first ball

inn2.comm: draws an edge straightaway as Warner drives uppishly outside off and the edge goes through the gully region for one
pushes the length delivery from just outside off to mid-on for one
full on middle and leg, Warner defends it back
bit too full outside off and Warner crunches it through the covers right in the gap for four
length delivery on the stumps, Warner blocks it back
bit shorter on the stumps, Warner hops back to work it to leg but plays too early and defends it back
on length outside off, Finch drives hard on the off side but doesn't middle it
bit wider outside off on length, pushes to cover this time
nips it in a little bit from outside off, Finch leans forward and pushes to cover
on off stump now and Finch pushes it down to mid on
swings it in from outside off as Finch goes for an extravagant drive and misses it completely
on the pads now and Finch cashes in by flicking it off his legs in the gap between mid on and midwicket for a four
short of length on the off stump, Warner stays back to defend it on the off side
full on middle and leg, checks his on driven a bit as it goes down to mido n
beats Warner as this one pitched on leg and moved towards middle. There was an inside edge actually onto the pads
he sees room on the off side, goes down on a knee for a powerful drive but misses
goes back for the back of length delivery on off and defends it on off
towards leg stump now, clipped to midwicket now
strays towards the pads again and Finch clips it fine down the leg side for another four. Finn not getting his lines right
outside the off stump now, he guides it to third man for one
that's gone high in the air, but lands safe, lucky for Warner! He drove the fullish delivery straight up in the air and down the ground, but it just beat mid on for two
he sees room again, drives again outside off and misses again
fullish on the off stump and it's crunched down straight to mid off
another one in the air as Warner drives uppishly outside off and the ball goes wide of point towards third man
back of length around off, Finch stays back and defends it back
bit wide outside off, Finch drives firmly but it's stopped at short cover with a dive
length delivery on off is pushed down to mid on with soft hands for a quick single. Direct hit at non-striker's end from Broad and Finch was in trouble
too full outside off and Warner connects with his drive this time! He got room to free his arms and went down on the knee to power it through the covers for four
back of length on leg stump, bit of extra bounce surprises Warner
bit short of length on leg and he mistimes the pull a bit and finds midwicket
leans forward and defends the length delivery on the off side
dropped by Finn! Finch drove the length delivery back toward the bowler's head and Finn got his hands to it but the ball popped out and went wide of mid off for four
shortish outside off, Finch pulls this time and misses
angled in towards leg stump, clipped to the leg side for a leg bye
seams away a bit from middle stump, steered to point off the back foot
too full and wide, Warner swings his arms and hits it high in the air using his wrists over the covers for four
puts his front foot forward and pushes the length delivery towards cover

he's chopped it on, Finch is gone! Finch didn't move much for the ball that held its line after pitching outside off on back of length, he stayed back to punch it on the off side but got an inside edge that took his off stump
well outside the off stump and Watson slices it to third man for one
beats Warner with a back of length delivery that nipped in, cramped him up for room as Warner defended awkwardly and could not get bat to it
short of length outside off, he stays back and punches to cover point
bit full on the pads, worked away to deep midwicket for one
goes for a slog and misses again! It was fullish and just outside off, Warner heaved on the leg side and missed it
fullish outside off, pushed into the covers now
full and wider now, Warner doesn't go hard at it and merely pushes it over the covers for four
bit slower on middle and leg, clipped off the pads for one past midwicket
back of length and angling in towards the batsman, worked to leg off the back foot for one
guides it very well on the off side. Again not using too much power for the wide delivery outside off and he merely got bat on it late enough to send it fine on the off side for four
on length outside off, Watson defends it into the covers
wider outside off, Watson chops and the ball reaches slip after a bounce
bit shorter outside off, Watson goes back and works it to midwicket
well outside off, Watson leans forward and drives to cover point
full on off and middle and Watson flicks it beautifully from the middle of the bat with the wrists to the square leg boundary for four
outside off again and it's driven straight to cover off the front foot
short and wide enough outside off for Warner to punch it off the back foot past a diving cover point for four
length delivery on middle and leg, Warner blocks it back
back of length on middle and leg again, he stays back to defend it on off
length delivery on leg stump, pushed on the leg side by Warner
wider on the leg side and Warner clips it to deep backward square leg for two
bit wide outside off now, Warner waits for it and punches it to Bell at point
starts with a wide delivery outside off, Watson had enough time to slice it late past point for four
leans forward and defends the length delivery angled in from outside off
short of length outside off, Watson rocks back and punches it by getting on top of it, wide of third man for two
bit of room again outside off and he guides it past point and wide of third man for two more
fullish now, still width on offer, and Watson drives it in the air to sweeper cover for one
length delivery outside off, pushed off the back foot to point
coming in from outside off, Watson leans forward and steers it to third man
fullish on the legs, clipped off the pads to deep backward square leg for two
just wide of mid off! Warner drove the length delivery in the air and Morgan ran to his right with a full-length dive but the ball was just out of his reach
defends the length delivery from outside off to short midwicket
this one's wide outside off, Watson pulls and misses completely
waits for this one outside off and steers it straight to point
short delivery, but not much room and Warner manages to guide it to third man
back of length outside off, punched back to the bowler
short and wide, cut fiercely off the back foot, but straight to point

Watson pulls again but is caught this time, very good catch by Woakes running in from deep midwicket! Watson pulled the short ball from just outside off and it went very high, Moeen was running in from deep square leg and Woakes from deep midwicket and the latter ran in a long way to grab it with both hands
slightly back of length on leg, pushed to the leg side by Warner
on length outside the off stump, pushed softly to backward point
watches the short of length delivery outside off and lets it go
another one outside off on similar length and left again
on length outside off and it's driven through the covers to get off the mark
cheeky shot! Short ball from Broad towards Warner's head, he swayed out of the line and get a faint bit of bat while playing the ramp shot to just clear the keeper
length delivery on middle and Warner pushes it off the middle of the bat through the covers in the gap for four more
length delivery right on middle stump, defended to cover point this time
goes across a bit and works the length delivery from outside off to the leg side
back of length towards the legs, worked off the hips on the leg side
towards the leg side now and Warner gets a leg bye off the pad
goes back in the crease and defends the short of length ball back to the bowler
nips it in fro outside off, Smith defends it back again
goes across a little bit for the back of length delivery angling in and works it to leg for a leg bye
fullish outside off, flicked with the wrists off the back foot to mid on
back of length on leg, worked off the hips to fine leg for one
leans forward and pushes the length delivery into the covers
good-length ball is driven into the covers again
moves across towards off and pushes the ball on off again
full outside off, whipped with the wrists to mid on. That's drinks
short ball, Warner pulls and it lands safely in the midwicket region for one
that's short and wide, slapped straight to backward point
goes back and works the incoming delivery to leg for a quick single
outside the leg stump and it's clipped off the pads for one to bring up his fifty
fullish outside off, he drives firmly but an edge goes to mid on
gets an edge on the incoming delivery as he tries to work it on leg but it goes on off
loud appeal for lbw as Warner tries reverse sweep first ball and is hit in front of leg stump. The umpire says no
bit of flight on the off stump, worked to the leg side
short and flat towards leg, worked behind square on leg for one
comes down and pushes the fullish ball to mid on
waits for it to turn and defends the ball to midwicket
flighted on middle, he comes down and drives to long on for one
back of length outside off and it's worked behind square on leg for one
bit too wide outside off and it's clipped on the leg side for one
on length on the legs, clipped off the pads towards fine leg for one
bit wide outside off, Warner chases tentatively and gets a thick outside edge as there's no slips
waits for it outside off and guides it to deep backward point for one
short and wide outside off, slapped off the back foot but point dives to save a few runs
short of length on middle, worked to leg off the back foot for one
flighted outside off, he comes down and drives to long on for one
length delivery towards off stump, Warner leaves forward and blocks
comes down this time and flicks to deep midwicket with the wrists
comes down and pushes it back past the bowler for one more
shorter and flatter outside off, steered through the point region for one
short ball towards Warner and he pulls it powerfully towards deep midwicket where Root runs a lot from square leg but can't cut it off
short and wide outside off now, Warner doesn't move his feet much and slaps it behind point for two
another short ball down the leg side, Warner pulls awkwardly and gets a bit of bat as it goes down fine leg for four
length delivery just outside off, he punches it off the back foot towards mid-off
short of length on middle stump, Warner waits for it and guides it towards point
length delivery outside off and he drives it down to mid on
full outside off and it's pushed back to the bowler
flighted on middle and leg, full again, Warner pushes it back to Moeen's right
comes down this time and whips the ball from middle and leg towards backward square leg
Smith comes down too and pushes the ball back to Moeen
going down leg and Smith paddles it without bending much fine down the leg side and they run like rabbits for three
on length outside off, driven into the covers
fullish around the off stump, driven down to long on for one
slightly slow outside the off stump, pushed to sweeper cover for one
angling in from around off, helped with the angle to the leg side for one
oh, that was a chance but very tough! Warner drove outside off, got an edge but it deflected off the keeper's gloves for two
length delivery outside off and it's pushed into the covers
length delivery outside off, steered to backward point off the back foot
that's gone high, that's all the way! He came down the track and smacked it over the long off boundary for a six from outside off
tossed up around off, whipped to the leg side for one
comes down a bit and pushes the ball to cover
goes back this time for the incoming delivery and works it to leg for one
presses forward and blocks it on off
turning in towards middle and leg, helped with the turn behind square on leg for one
outside the off stump, steered straight to backward point
incoming delivery towards the leg side and Smith helped it along the angle by guiding it fine down the leg side for four
outside off now and it's steered past point for two more. Can't do much when these two want to run two
length delivery is driven through the covers for one
fullish on middle and leg, driven down to long on for one
not too wide outside off, steered towards point off the front foot
comes down to take it on the full and drives it down to long off. The two even exchanged high fives while taking the run
strays down the leg side for a wide
comes down and whips the ball to leg
slightly over pitched and Smith smacks it like a sweep and gets four on the midwicket boundary for four
pitched up on off, pushed back to the bowler
comes down the track and powers it down to long off for one
short ball on the leg side and Warner pulls it to the deep backward square leg boundary for four
length delivery on off, pushed towards the covers
good short ball on middle, Warner jumps to steer the ball to third man
pushes the length delivery into the covers off the front foot
thick edge as Smith looks to work it on leg but gets a single past point
room with the short ball outside off, it's smashed straight to backward point
turning in from off, Smith helps it to midwicket
comes down the track and whips the ball to fine leg for one
run out chance! Warner made some room first and then steered it towards point, Smith was way out of his crease when the ball went past the non-striker's end for an overthrow
flighted on off, he drives it down to long-on for one
strays towards the pads and Warner and he works it past square leg
he charges down to drive, misses and is bowled! It was a full delivery on the stumps, Smith wanted to go over the covers with his inside-out drive but missed it completely and lost his stumps

another run out chance missed! Warned pulled the short ball to deep midwicket, there was hesitation after the first run from both batsmen but they went ahead with the second and the inaccurate throw helped Bailey at the non-striker's end. Finn was also not standing behind the stumps
short of length ball, worked towards midwicket for one
that's bouncer just outside off, first of the over
length delivery just outside off, defended back to the bowler
back of length outside the off stump, he defends off the back foot
short ball angled in, Bailey pulls it wide of deep fine leg for one
fullish on off, worked straight to midwicket
comes down the track and clips the ball from outside off to leg
helps the turning delivery to short fine leg off the back foot
goes back and across and flicks the ball to midwicket
comes down and drives the ball down to long on for one
stays back and punches the shortish delivery outside off, it goes just wide of long off and they run two more
length delivery outside off, he defends the ball back to the bowler
shorter delivery towards the batsman, he goes on his toes and defends it
outside off and it's driven down to mid off
on length outside off, he pushes it into the covers
on length on the off stump, Bailey defends it back
slightly short of length outside off, Bailey defends off the back foot
yorks Warner on the middle stump, he digs it out on the off side
fullish on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
full and well outside off, driven firmly but straight to cover
bit closer to the off stump, pushed past cover for one
he works the ball with the turn to the leg side for one
goes back and makes room, steers the ball into the covers for one more
full and wide, you can't bowl there to Warner! He goes down on a knee and smashes it over the covers for a cracking four. He was smiling while playing that shot!
short of length delivery outside off, Warner doesn't middle the cut and gets one towards point
length delivery outside off, pushed into the covers
short of length delivery is pulled on the leg side for one
short ball coming in, Warner pulls it to the leg side and gets only one
wants to drive the length delivery from off into the covers but gets an edge and it goes to mid on
full delivery is pushed back to Moeen
comes down and pushes the length delivery into the covers
poor delivery down the leg side, swept fine to the fine leg area for four and that's his hundred, third in ODIs, and fourth international hundred since early December
short and flat, he makes some room and cuts it past point for two
comes down the track and pushes the ball to long off for one
loud appeal for lbw from the keeper and bowler as Bailey looked to sweep it across the line, missed and it was pretty close. But no says the umpire. That's time for a drink
Warner makes room, Woakes chases him and he gets two leg byes down the leg side
fullish outside off, pushed firmly down the ground to mid off
makes room, goes for a big heave and misses the incoming length delivery
short ball, Warner pulls handsomely and collects for more from the midwicket boundary. Short or full, you can't bowl to him there
Woakes chases Warner again as he makes room, another leg bye on the leg side off the pads
short ball to Bailey too, and he smacks it to the midwicket boundary along the ground off the back foot
full just outside off, Warner drives it over Bailey's head towards long off for one
seams it in from outside off, Bailey gets a thick outside edge for one on the off side
slightly short of length outside off, slapped towards long on for one
short ball outside off, Bailey pulls it but not from the middle to mid on
short and wide, cut to point off the back foot for one
full and outside off, punched down the ground to long off for one
tries a heave on the leg side, misses and gets a leg bye on the off side
the Powerplay does produce a wicket! Short of length ball outside off, Bailey pulled and got a top edge which went high and towards gully. Buttler called for it and took it easily
on length outside off, crunched into the covers for one
charges down, makes room and slaps the short ball to cover point at the edge of the circle

there's a loud appeal for caught behind and he's gone! It was a fullish delivery outside off, Maxi poked without much footwork, the keeper and bowler went up and so did the umpire's finger! But replays and HotSpot confirm there was no edge, the sound was of the bat hitting the ground
incoming delivery towards the stumps, helped to the leg side for one
fullish on the off stump, Haddin smacks it straight down the ground over the umpire'a head for four!
and another one! Short ball follows the full delivery and this one is pulled wide of the deep midwicket fielder for four
oh, what a shot! He made room, the ball was coming in towards leg stump and he cut it fiercely past point for four
full on the leg stump, Warner heaves it to the wide long on boundary for another cracking four!
full outside off now, steered to cover for one
it's full, it's smacked, it's four! Cleared his front foot out of the way and cleared the mid on fielder
that's a switch hit, but he doesn't connect well. Changed the grip of the bat and could not clear the leg side in field
stays left-handed this time and gets a full toss to smash it over the fine leg boundary for four. Might have been a no ball, but not given

oh, another wicket, Warner also falls. He tried to heave the length delivery on the off side over the in field but got a leading edge and was caught at point. Raises the bat for the crowd while walking back
full outside off, driven easily to sweeper cover for one
slightly short outside off, Faulkner slaps it right between mid on and midwicket for four. Bonus point becomes easy now
makes a bit of room and pushes the length ball back to the bowler
full toss on the pads and it's clipped on the leg side for one
charges down the track and Broad angles it in, Faulkner pokes and misses

oh, that's chaos, that's just poor stuff from Australia as Haddin is run out! Faulkner dug out the full delivery to short midwicket, Haddin was already halfway down the track and Bopara ran to the non-striker's end with the ball to run him out
it's done now, Faulkner makes sure there are no more stutters as he slaps the ball just over Bopara at short midwicket for two and Australia do get the bonus point
